revised_title: Adsorption of Long-Chain Ions and Surface Equations of State
tldr: The authors study the adsorption of long-chain ions and develop equations of state for uncharged and charged monolayers. They derive the Kuster isotherm for charged films at the oil/water interface and discuss the relation between surface pressure and concentration. The findings contribute to understanding the behavior of long-chain ions and their applications in surface chemistry.
